sentences.en: Activity is the only road to knowledge. — George Bernard Shaw, British dramatist.
sentences.cn: 行动是通往知识的唯一道路. ——萧伯纳, 英国剧作家.

sentences.en: After the boss left, the dramatist had a dozen buns for supper. Then he began to doze off.
sentences.cn: 老板走后，剧作家吃了一打面包作为晚餐然后开始打瞌睡了。

sentences.en: As a dramatist I hate to moralize.
sentences.cn: 作为一名剧作家，我憎恨说教。

sentences.en: Ben Jonson is a dramatist, and one of Shakespeare contemporaries in the Renaissance.
sentences.cn: 本·琼生(BenJonson )是英国文艺复兴时期的戏剧家, 和莎士比亚是同一时代的人.
他是个有独创性的剧作家.
他是一位著名的剧作家.

sentences.en: He was himself a talented journalist, editor, dramatist, song - writer and novelist.
sentences.cn: 克劳斯是一名出色的记者 、 编辑 、 剧作家 、 歌曲作者和小说家.

sentences.en: How very extraordinary that you should have never heard of such a talented dramatist!
sentences.cn: 真怪,你竟然没听说过这样一位天才的剧作家!

sentences.en: I don't really want to be a poet, dramatist, or whatever.
sentences.cn: 我并不真想当诗人, 剧作家, 或其他诸如此类的人.

sentences.en: Shakespeare is, by common consent, the greatest English dramatist.
sentences.cn: 莎士比亚被公认是英国最伟大的剧作家.

sentences.en: Shaw is considered to be the best - known English dramatist since Shakespeare.
sentences.cn: 萧伯纳在戏剧方面被公认为自莎士比亚后,英国最优秀的戏剧大师.

sentences.en: The dramatist was respected by people in his country.
sentences.cn: 这个剧作家受到了本国人民的尊敬.

sentences.en: The empty vessels make the atest sound. ( William Shakespeare , British dramatist )
Virtue is bold, and goodness never fearful. ( William shakespeare, British dramatist )
sentences.cn: 美德是勇敢的, 善良从来无所畏惧. ( 英国剧作家莎士比亚 )

sentences.en: With his new play he has consolidated his position as the country's leading dramatist.
sentences.cn: 他有了新创作的剧本,巩固了他在国内的杰出剧作家的地位.
